name: beer-o-clock-clock
description: A webapp which tells you where in the world it is beer o'clock (5PM) at the moment

scripts.clean: rm -rf build/ && mkdir build && cd build && mkdir js style img
scripts.css: postcss --use autoprefixer -d build/style style/index.css && cleancss -o build/style/index.css build/style/index.css
scripts.other: cp robots.txt build/ && cp manifest.json build/ && babel --presets=es2015,babili --out-file build/sw.js sw.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run js && npm run css && npm run html && npm run img && npm run other
